postData.contentHtml:
About

I started out my career as a mechanical engineer but got interested in software in my last job when I wrote a program for visualizing microfluidic systems (more info).

When I realized that I was spending more time working on visualization program than on the experiments that the program was made for, I decided to pursue software developement fulltime.

From February to June 2020, I attended App Academy (web development bootcamp, 3% acceptance rate). I am currently working on personal projects and seeking a developer position. You can reach me at howard.L.hwang@gmail.com. Thanks for reading!
